short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An improved graphic interface for your favourite links

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension is designed to improve customization and access of links. From  customized size, appearance and layout, it will make it easier to visit your favourite links. The extension when installed will make your default new tab page as a customized canvas to make shortcuts to your favourite links. However, a switch at the top right corner will let you switch back to the default new tab screen. Features include, adding, deleting, editing and customizing settings of the canvas. When the extension is clicked the current link can be easily copied to create a new shortcut. 

★★★★★
If you like it, please leave a rating.

If you have any suggestions, please leave a comment

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

*Always download and use at your own discretion. Do not save private or critical links, always check to make sure the data saved is correct by inspecting the record via edit mode.
